# Plugin Refactor Plan

## Current Status

### Phase 1: Complete
- All initial refactoring tasks have been completed.

### Phase 2: Complete
- All tasks related to optimization and testing have been finished.

### Phase 3: Ongoing
- Implement enhancements from Issues #146, #147, #148
- Integrate feedback from team reviews.

### Phase 4: Documentation
- Document new features and ensure that user guides are updated based on implementations from Issues #149 and #150.

### Phase 5: Final Testing
- Complete testing based on enhancements from Issues #151, #152, #153, and #160.
- Awaiting final reviewer feedback.

## Remaining Work
- Finalize testing outcomes.
- Address any blockers identified in the previous phases.
- Prepare for the release based on completed enhancements and document all changes.
